txt.en: You should clear some of these slugs out of the marshes

Marsh-slugs may be found throughout the marshes, east of Oserley.\n\nWhile you are hunting for the leader of the brigands, you might assist the people of Oserley by clearing the poisonous slugs out of the marshes.
The marshes east of Oserley are fraught with poisonous slugs, which might pose a threat to the people there.
While you are hunting for the leader of the brigands, you might assist the people of Oserley by clearing the poisonous slugs out of the marshes.
